Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Ghost Town Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town and the central conflict surrounding its impending demolition for an airport. It establishes the main characters and their initial reactions to this news, setting the stage for emotional and personal conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Setting the Scene and Initial Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the comic's title, setting, and initial character interactions, establishing the core conflict of preserving Ghost Town against modern development.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town
Saloon Exit and Ghost Town Ride
Ghost Town's Past and Airport Future

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Turmoil and Flashback
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene deepens the emotional impact of the Ghost Town's demolition, focusing on the woman's emotional argument and flashback to the town's past, highlighting her personal connection to it.

narrative_arcs.title: Emotional Argument about Ghost Town's Demolition

Major_Arcs.title: Family and Romantic Tensions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to family dynamics and romantic relationships, particularly focusing on Nan's conflicts with her father, her feelings for Cal, and the differing perspectives on love and responsibility amidst the backdrop of the airport construction.

sub_scenes.title: Business, Family Argument, and Nan's Distress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces business discussions related to the airport and horses, leading to a family argument between Nan and her father and Nan's subsequent emotional distress.

sub_scenes.title: Maternal Advice and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Nan seeking comfort and advice from her mother and maid, leading to her determination to understand her relationship with Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Maid's Pragmatic View on Love and Action

sub_scenes.title: Relationship Conflict and Hesitant Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan and Cal's relationship tensions, Cal's dismissive behavior followed by a surprising, hesitant confession of his feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation and Weather Crisis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan and Cal's reconciliation amidst a sudden, severe snowstorm that threatens their livelihood.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Reconciliation and Understanding
Mr. Wills and Son Assess the Snowstorm's Severity
Grave Concerns about Livestock and Fodder
Confirmation of the Weather's Unprecedented Danger
Seeking Comfort and Hope Amidst Hardship
Cal's Ominous Reflection on Impending Starvation and Future Uncertainty
Nan's Doubt and Cal's Reassurance in the Face of Crisis
Nan's Mother's Plea for Rest and Hope Amidst Overwhelming Odds
Cal's Restless Night and the Unrelenting Snow
Despair and Weariness in the Face of Endless Winter
Sound of an Airplane and a Glimmer of Hope
Excitement and Realization of Fodder Drop
Conversation on Romance Amidst Crisis and Relief

Major_Arcs.title: Cowtown Casanova and Town Dynamics
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new setting and characters in 'Cowtown', focusing on Chane Benson's arrival and the varied reactions of the townspeople to his actions and persona, setting up potential conflicts and character explorations.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Bystander Reactions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a fight scene and showcases the immediate reactions and judgments of different townspeople regarding his character and actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and a Town Scene
Reactions and Judgments of Bystanders on Chane Benson's Actions
Further Reactions and Cynical Commentary on Chane Benson

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Concerns and Moral Contrasts
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to a mother's perspective, revealing her concerns about Jeff's fascination with gun violence and contrasting her moral values with Chane Benson's persona.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother's Flashback and Concerns About Jeff
Macho Banter and Violent Undertones between Clyde and Chane

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Worry and Clyde's Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Sally's growing concern for Jeff and her attempts to get help from Clyde, highlighting relationship dynamics and differing approaches to dealing with Jeff's situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Affectionate Agreement and Future Vision
Narrator's Observation of Jeff's Absence and Town Ride
Sally Seeks Advice from Mr. Benson
Mr. Benson's Advice on Violence and Youth

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Article Conflict and Sally's Actions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a conflict stemming from a newspaper article, showing Sally's outrage, Clyde's dismissive attitude as the editor, and Sally seeking guidance from Benson.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Outrage Over the Article and Initial Talk with Benson
Sally Confronts Clyde, the Editor, About the Article
Clyde's Dismissive Reaction and Sally's Criticism
Sally Seeks Benson's Guidance in Juniper

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Plan and Dinner Invitation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Benson's plan to use the press for truth and introduces Jeff and Sally's decision to invite Chane to dinner, complicating the existing tensions.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Reaction to the Article and Speculation on Clyde's Response
Considering Dinner with Chane and Reflecting on His Character

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Tension and Physical Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the dinner with Chane leading to misunderstandings, escalating tensions, and culminating in a physical confrontation and forced kiss, dramatically increasing the stakes.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Dinner Moonlight Conversation and Rising Tension

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath, Realization of Danger, and Town Showdown
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the immediate fallout of the forced kiss, Sally's realization of danger to Clyde, Jeff's determined ride to town, and the confrontation in town leading to a showdown.

narrative_arcs.title: Immediate Aftermath and Explanations Following the Forced Kiss
Realization of Danger to Clyde and Urgent Need to Go to Town
Jeff's Determined Ride to Save Clyde
Confrontation in Town and Jeff's Intervention
Escalating Tensions and a Challenge to a Fistfight
Anxious Wait in the Clarion Office
Recounting the Night's Events and Newspaper Priority
Praise for Jeff and Clyde's Character and Family Values

Major_Arcs.title: Range War and Romantic Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc transitions to a new setting and characters, focusing on ranch troubles, a potential range war, and the burgeoning romance between Betsy and Steve amidst these challenges.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Ranch Conflict and New Boss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces immediate ranch conflict and the arrival of the new boss, Steve Daley, setting up both external and internal ranch tensions.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the New Boss, Steve Daley

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Troubles and Growing Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the ranch's problems and initiates the romantic development between Betsy and Steve, amidst Hank's doubts about Steve's judgment.

narrative_arcs.title: Settling Steve In and Past Doubts
Ranch Troubles and Range War Fear
Trip to Town and Hank's Orders for Dress Material

sub_scenes.title: Hank's Reprieve and Betsy's Romantic Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves Hank's job uncertainty and showcases Betsy's internal romantic realization and initial romantic interactions with Steve.

sub_scenes.title: External Threats and Confirmed Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene tests the newly formed romance with external threats and internal doubts, culminating in a confirmation of love amidst ongoing ranch conflicts.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Hank and Steve's Defense
Justification for Arms and Recall of Ambush
Betsy's Narration of Pursuit and Arrival at Devil's Pass
Confrontation and Capture at Devil's Pass

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Entanglements and Business Deception
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to another set of romantic and business-related conflicts, introducing new characters and focusing on themes of jealousy, deception, and romantic misunderstandings intertwined with business dealings.

sub_scenes.title: Dave, Betsy, and Fred - Initial Romantic Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a romantic triangle involving Betsy, Dave, and Fred, setting up initial conflicts and misunderstandings.

narrative_arcs.title: Curley's Troubled Behavior and Ranch Concerns

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Violent Escalation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays a business dispute over a fence escalating into a violent confrontation, highlighting tensions and betrayals.

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores reconciliation attempts between Carrie and Dave, contrasting opinions about Fred, and Carrie's foreshadowed encounter with Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion of Fred and Differing Opinions
Agreement to Avoid Conflict and Carrie's Reflection
Encounter with Fred Gordon and Ominous Question

sub_scenes.title: Unveiling Deception and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene uncovers Fred's manipulative business tactics and leads to Carrie's furious confrontation, revealing the depth of his deception.

narrative_arcs.title: Miss Bronson and Mr. Gordon's Conversation about Dave's Feelings
Accusations and Assertions in Carlton's Office
Reflecting on Past Pride and Present Hurt with Fred
Unexpected Encounter and Cold Dismissal in Town
Concern and Defiance in the Buckboard
Father and Dave's Clarification & Carlton's Interjection
Dave's Confession and Carrie's Ride to Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Chris and Rance's Story - Danger and Deception
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a separate storyline focusing on Chris and Rance, involving danger, deception, and a developing romance amidst criminal activities and moral dilemmas.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Arrival and Injury
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Dirk's injured arrival at Chris's place, setting up a scenario of danger and Chris's initial reaction and care.

narrative_arcs.title: Late Night Visitor and Urgent Plea

sub_scenes.title: Family Concern and Marshal's Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dirk's worried family and the arrival of the Marshal, expanding the scope of the conflict and investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Worried Kin and a Father's Decision

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Confrontation and Shifting Plans
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the Marshal's interrogation, Chris's plea, and a change in the Marshal's plans, shifting from arrest to temporary custody.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Mercy and a Change of Plans

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confession and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene centers on the romantic confession between Chris and Rance, juxtaposed with the practical considerations of Dirk's escape and the conflict between love and duty.

narrative_arcs.title: Duty vs. Love and a Hint of Escape
Decision to Act and Arming Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Pursuit, and Moral Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dirk's escape and immediate pursuit, escalating into a gunfight and a moral crisis regarding the injured Marshal's fate.

sub_scenes.title: Recovery and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Chris and Rance's storyline with Rance's recovery, their romantic reconciliation, and a marriage proposal, resolving their immediate conflicts and setting up a happy ending.

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Preparations and Dirk's Final Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the pre-wedding moments, the ceremony beginning, and Dirk's dramatic and final interruption, bringing the various storylines to a head at the wedding event.
